res: Evaluate in closed form \[ \sum_{k=1}^n {n \choose k} k^2. \]Show that the expression equals $n(n+1)2^{n-2}$.
Translating: Evaluate in closed form \[ \sum_{k=1}^n {n \choose k} k^2. \]Show that the expression equals $n(n+1)2^{n-2}$.

res.typeView: ∀ (n : ℕ), ∑ k ∈ Finset.range (n + 1), n.choose k * k ^ 2 = n * (n + 1) * 2 ^ (n - 2)
